class_notes: Must enroll in BIOL_OX 141L first, then in BIOL_OX 141. Must be enrolled in both courses or will be dropped at preregistration or Add/Drop/Swap. Synchronous class attendance required. Technology required: ability to scan written work.
course_description: The study of cell structure and function including cellular metabolism, fundamentals of genetics, evolution, and population genetics. Emphasizes scientific inquiry. Fulfills biology major and pre-health requirements. Note: students receiving AP/IB credit for BIOL 141 must still take BIOL_OX 141L or BIOL 141L for SNTL, biology, or pre-health requirements.
